import { useEffect } from 'react';
import { Meta, Story, Props, Preview } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';
import SearchInput from '..';
import Label from '../../Label';
import Highlight from '../../Highlight';

export const onChangeHandler = (evt) => {
  document.getElementById('search-label').innerHTML = evt.target.value;
}


<Meta title="Components/SearchInput" />

<Story name="Import" />

# SearchInput

Search are text fields designed for the user to enter search queries into.

## Import

```jsx
import { SearchInput } from '@qnt/ui';
```

<Story name="Props" />

## Props

<Props of={SearchInput} />

## Usage

### Default

<Preview withToolbar>
  <Story name="Default">
    <>
      <SearchInput />
    </>
  </Story>
</Preview>

### placeholder

<Preview withToolbar>
  <Story name="placeholder">
    <>
      <SearchInput placeholder="Custom placeholder text..."/>
    </>
  </Story>
</Preview>

### onChange

<Preview withToolbar>
  <Story name="onChange">
    <>
      <SearchInput
        onChange={evt => onChangeHandler(evt)}
      />
      <br />
      <br />
      <Label isWarning isBold>Search text will appear here...</Label>
      <Highlight id="search-label"></Highlight>
    </>
  </Story>
</Preview>
